trans-unit.source: Computes the logical OR of two values.
trans-unit.target: Calcula o OR lógico de dois valores.

trans-unit.source: To do this, both operands are evaluated to boolean values.
trans-unit.target: Para fazer isso, ambos os operandos são avaliados para valores boolianos.

trans-unit.source: If both operands are <see langword="false" /> then the expression returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Se ambos os operandos forem <see langword="false" />, a expressão retornará <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If one or both operands evaluate to <see langword="true" />, the expression returns <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Se o resultado de um ou mais operandos for <see langword="true" />, a expressão retornará <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.OrElse" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.OrElse" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the left operand.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o operando esquerdo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> that represents the left operand.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> que representa o operando da esquerda.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the right operand.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o operando direito.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> that represents the right operand.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> que representa o operando direito.
